casebody.data:
No. 90,

October Term, 1940.

Carlota Benitez Sampayo v. Bank of Nova Scotia. October 13, 1941.

The motion for an extension of time to file a supplement to the petition for rehearing and the motion to recall the mandate are denied. The petition for rehearing is denied.

The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration and decision of these applications.

313 U. S. 270.
